title: Pogačar Makes Racing Boring (but Brilliant), and More Hot Takes from the Spring Classics
content:
5 takeaways from the cobblestone and Ardennes classics, including the inevitability of Pog, the potential of Puck, and why Paris-Roubaix always rules.

Read the full article at Pogačar Makes Racing Boring (but Brilliant), and More Hot Takes from the Spring Classics on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
